title: All time test xi....Team S or Team T.

comments.body: Pes cricket team will beat them both ....Team P ftw
you guys haven't even watch em play lmao
Nah brudda...we be watchin cricket from 2011; just gotta prove my bro my teamz superior....
Team S spin attack is goated but team T fast bowling attack is better
Which team do you think will win if they face...
Depends on the pitch dude in English conditions I would favour S any day but for overall I'd say T
Second one McGrath and Steyn in one team is a menace
